name: Lemon Vinaigrette
description: Homemade lemon vinaigrette is far superior to store-bought salad dressings! Fresh lemon shines in this simple recipe using basic ingredients.
ingredients: ⅓ cup lemon juice (from about 2 lemons)
1 to 2 tablespoons honey or maple syrup, to taste
Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
Pinch of red pepper flakes (optional, for heat)
instructions: Combine all of the ingredients and whisk until blended.  Season generously with black pepper and adjust to taste by adding more honey if the dressing tastes too tart. This dressing keeps well in the refrigerator, covered, for up to 10 days.
